body:
Is it only me or everyone get annoying with this type of manhwa. 
First this is not manga, it's manhwa. Second they have too much update and spamming category.
This manhwa need new tags and delete their old unupdated version. Seriously netorare tag full of this shit.

For people that are just reading this: The one doing the fucking is the MC. This is a netori revenge porn. MC was bullied in school by the guy getting cucked right now. Bully was having a sexual relationship with the class teacher(FMC) which is the women getting fucked.
3/10 for me, too cliché or something
